main.name: John Gordley
main.description: I have a drive for social work and I am looking for practical experiences that will build me into someone capable of large-scale positive change
main.bio: I love to program new web applications. I am also very interested in video game development, specifically educational game development. You can find me on the Notre Dame soccer fields or the planetarium in my free time, as I am a member of the Club Soccer team and the DVT tech team. I also like to workout and go on runs to keep my mind and body healthy!
main.contactmessage: Want to work with me? Get in touch below.

resume.skillmessage: My skills based on previous internship/work experience.

education.degree: BS in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: Loving life at a university focused on social change and making a commmunity impact. The football is pretty fun too.

education.school: Center for Network Data Science at Notre Dame
education.degree: Interdisciplinary Traineeship for Socially Responsible and Engaged Data Scientists (iTREDS)
education.description: Working to develop an in-depth data science background as well as communication, critical thinking, teamwork, and other skills necessary for professional development.

work.title: Computer Engineering Intern
work.description: Implemented rigorous validation checks using Python to ensure a consistent documentation development process through the Swagger API. Developed Call Control and Messaging project content for users of the Telnyx Platform to use for self-service and learning through tutorials and documentation.

work.title: Student Research Assistant
work.description: Using Python auto-generation to update demonstrations in the DVT while also assisting in presentations covering astronomy, climate change, and physics.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Created an online documentation service from scratch using React.js to assist product users and instituted user experience improvements to the React Native app including color theme generation and mobile scaling.

projects.title: Iceburgh Connections Tracker
projects.category: A free networking and job search tracker for students built using React.js and Firebase.

projects.title: Time Left on Stuff
projects.category: A task manager based on time. Allocate tasks and play them when they are in progress, built with React.js and Firebase.

projects.title: Rock Roller vs. Paper
projects.category: A video game I made for weekly game jam 154 on itch.io. The theme was rock, paper, scissors.
